description:
"Release the Dreamers" is a 6 part video series (professionally recorded with a live studio audience) suitable for ages 15 and up. RTD can be delivered individually or to a small group setting. This course was birthed out of a desire to encourage and equip people to dream again, and to give them the appropriate keys to see the dream/s fulfilled.

The 6 topics include:

1. Renew

2. Recall

3. Refine

4. Rekindle

5. Rejoice

6. Relentless

Each session goes for approximately 20 minutes and includes 10-15 minutes of activation at the end. RTD works best if all sessions are completed in order.

This course will breath life on your imagination and certainly motivate you to see your dreams become a reality.
title: Live your dream  -  " Release the Dreamers "
